summary:
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list.

We have class SharedAttentionProcessor. Docstring empty. Method summaries: __call__, __init__, shared_call, shifted_scaled_dot_product_attention. So class likely processes attention mechanisms, maybe for transformer models, providing shared attention computation with shifted scaled dot-product attention.

We need to infer responsibilities: It likely encapsulates attention computation that can be shared across multiple heads or layers, providing a helper for shifted scaled dot-product attention (maybe for relative positional encoding). So summary: class implements shared attention processing, offering a callable interface that computes shifted scaled dot-product attention, facilitating reuse across models.

Business intent: Provide efficient, reusable attention computation for machine learning models, especially transformers, to improve performance and modularity.

Keywords: attention, transformer, scaled dot-product, shifted attention, shared processing, neural network, helper, compute, reusable, machine learning.
